results.title: Growing up in Bendigo
results.brief_description: Bendigo - short MTV style doco compiled from short interviews with teenagers on the streets of Bendigo. Subject matter includes how they feel about living in Bendigo, their hopes, aspirations, and whether they would like to stay in the town they grew up in as adults
results.description: Bendigo - short MTV style doco compiled from short interviews with teenagers on the streets of Bendigo. Subject matter includes how they feel about living in Bendigo, their hopes, aspirations, and whether they would like to stay in the town they grew up in as adults

Dennis O'Hoy: Bendigo Born and Bred

results.title: The Golden dragons
results.brief_description: Bendigo - Bendigo’s annual Easter parade has featured the Dragon and Lion dancers from the Bendigo Chinese Association for over 100 years. This mini documentary explores how this historical tradition has helped shape the identities of the dancers and features interviews combined with footage of their colourful and exciting dance held at dusk at the Dragons’ spiritual home - Bendigo’s Golden Dragon Museum of Australia
results.description: Bendigo - Bendigo’s annual Easter parade has featured the Dragon and Lion dancers from the Bendigo Chinese Association for over 100 years. results.title: Dennis O'Hoy: Bendigo Born and Bred
results.brief_description: Interview for the MAP project with lifelong Bendigo resident, Dennis O’Hoy, about his family history in the area, and his great love of, and identification with, the place where he lives.

results.title: A Postcard from Ovens
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture and Jack Keane
results.brief_description: An edited excerpt from ‘Working Holiday’ (1957) produced by Jack Keane for the Victorian Department of Agriculture. Shows hop picking in Victoria where seasonal workers gather from all parts of Australia for six weeks to harvest hops in the rich Ovens Valley. The weekend breaks are spent swimming, fishing or sight-seeing in the surrounding Alps.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture and Jack Keane
